      • parseInteractionTermination

                                        java.lang.String[] rules,
                                        java.lang.String[] terminations)
        parse both rules and termination and add them to the current game object
        Parameters:
        currentGame - the current game object
        rules - the current interaction set as in the VGDL file
        terminations - the current termination set as in the VGDL file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public Node indentTreeParser(java.lang.String[] lines)
